message: Hello Bob, I have a great product that I think you'll really like. I'm willing to sell it to you for $200. Is this something you'd be interested in?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $150. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I understand you're interested in the product, but I have to make a profit. I can meet you halfway at $175. Would you be willing to go up to that price?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $160. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?

I can see you're a serious buyer, and I appreciate that. However, I still need to make a profit. I can go a bit lower, but I'm thinking more along the lines of $165. Would you be willing to meet me there?
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go up to $165. I'm willing to meet you at $155. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I can see you're really interested in the product, and I'm willing to make a bit more of a concession. However, I'm not willing to go below $162. Would you be willing to meet me there?
I appreciate your willingness to make a concession, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go up to $162. I'm willing to meet you at $157. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I'm starting to feel like we're getting close, but I still need to make a profit. I can go a bit lower, but I'm thinking more along the lines of $159. Would you be willing to meet me there?
